long_description: In a size that's easy to take on the road, the GoFit Go Roller kit gives you all the tools you need to improve your flexibility and help sore muscles recover from tough workouts. 4 x 12 in. foam roller features dense foam for a soft touch and a rigid core for firm support; open core design allows for use during core exercises and massage. Myofascial release ball delivers deep, targeted therapy for tough muscle knots. GoFit Go Roller kit includes foam roller, massage ball, mesh carry bag and training manual.
short_description: In a size that's easy to take on the road, the GoFit Go Roller kit gives you all the tools you need to improve your flexibility and help sore muscles recover from tough workouts.
